content.title: üöÄ First Stretch Goal Unlocked! Time for a Giveaway!
content.creator:
AOHi
March 3, 2025
content.content:
Backers, you‚Äôre incredible! 
Thanks to your support, we‚Äôve officially crossed the $100K milestone‚Äîand that means our first stretch goal is unlocked!
As a token of our appreciation, every backer will now receive a FREE travel pouch to keep your Starship power bank protected and ready for any adventure.
But we‚Äôre not stopping here! Our next mission? $300K! Once we hit this goal, all backers will also receive an AOHi 140W PD 3.1 USB-C cable‚Äîabsolutely free.
Backers-Only Giveaway: Win an Adonis Cable!
To celebrate this achievement, we‚Äôre hosting a backers-only giveaway where 5 lucky winners will receive a premium Adonis cable!
Here‚Äôs how to enter:
1Ô∏è‚É£ Like this update 
2Ô∏è‚É£ Head to our Kickstarter campaign page and leave a comment telling us which feature of Future Starship Pro you love the most
The 5 winners will be the backers whose comments receive the most replies! 
The giveaway ends when the campaign does, and winners will be announced shortly after. 
Let‚Äôs keep pushing forward‚Äînext stop, $300K! üöÄüí•
 Share the campaign  and help us reach the next milestone faster!
‚Äî Team AOHi

comments.text: Love the black and yellow color~
I'm excited to receive this power bank because I can charge any of my devices, including my laptop, on the go!
i love it for the nameee. starshippp
Why do I love it? For everything you've been telling us about it's capabilities. If they are true it'll be a game changer!
Why do I love this? The small size and the big capabilities are the real game-changer..

Why do I love this? Hmmm a lot of reasons: The best thing about the Aohi The best thing about the AoHi Starship Pro 10,000mAh power bank is its insane 210W total output in such a compact form. It's rare to find a power bank this small that can fast-charge a laptop, phone, and other devices simultaneously. The dual USB-C ports with 140W and 70W power delivery make it super versatile, whether you're charging a MacBook, Steam Deck, or a smartphone. I also really like the 90W fast input, which means you can recharge it to 60% in just 15 minutes. That‚Äôs a game-changer compared to typical power banks that take hours to refill. Plus, the smart digital display showing real-time wattage is a nice touch for tech enthusiasts who like to monitor their power usage. I am really excited with this new projects again.
Why do I love it? The design has a pass-through charging ability. The consistent and frequent communication from Aohi. A refreshing change compared to the other projects I have backed on Kickstarter
Why do I love it? Many reasons, but I especially love the smart display and how powerful it is. Being able to power multiple devices while on the go is a lifesaver for me!
Why I like AOHI? Simple. These guys are responsive with consistent reassuring updates.

I love the super fast charging, including for multiple devices in a hopefully heat-stable device (a long ago effort nearly achieved ignition!). I'm never without my phone and headphones for my own sanity, and knowing this will keep my support systems going well be a lifesaver!

I love the small size of the device and its weight. I live in a area with lots of power outages and this will be perfect to use as a backup power device for my insulin pump giving me lifesaving medication when needed.
I look forward to being able to charge my laptop and power my travel monitor while travelling for work. The size of perfect for navigating at the airport.

A compact fast charging powerhouse with simultaneous fast charge and 4 ports is like a dream come true! The notification LED and sleek exterior are just bonuses! Coupled with ultra fast USB-C cables, this is a real Pocket Rocket!
It's the size that I love.
The ability to charge a laptop while on the go
Love all the information on the display. I have the Starship 240W, and it is comforting to know that my phone and tablets are being charged efficiently and safely.
Love the size and power of the power bank.

I really like that you kept the Future Starship Pro power Bank at regulation size for going through TSA checkpoints in airports. I travel multiple times a year doing missionary work around the world, it will be nice to have great power in a small package.
Looking forward to having this. Power, portability, and convenience all in small package. Amazing!
Love the size and power of the power bank!
Looking forward to the newest version. Love the current model.
What I really love the most is this powerbank charges pretty much anything you plug into it to 100% charge as fast as possible!
Perfect device at the beach to power all my devices at once!
I like the size of the powerbank and its speed, perfect combo üëë

I'm most excited about the 210W max power output,so that I can charge both my MacBook and my iPhone at the same time. I travel for a living, and this will give me peace of mind when using both devices overseas or while traveling.

content.content:
Hey everyone,
We‚Äôre excited by the support for The Future Starship Pro 210W Powerbank, and we want to give back to the community that‚Äôs making this possible.
A lot of you have been asking about a travel pouch‚Äîso we‚Äôre making it happen!
We‚Äôre getting close to the first goal, and with your help, we can hit these stretch goals even faster. Share the campaign with your friends, family, and anyone who loves powerful, compact charging.

content.title: 100% Funded in Just 15 Minutes ‚Äì Thank You!
content.creator:
AOHi
February 20, 2025
content.content:
